name: Beat the bees
description:
You play the game as the greedy beekeeper who has built a excessive amount of hives and is harvesting honey far too often.

The bees have had enough and you have harvested honey for the last time, you arm yourself with a peashooter and stand your ground in the middle of the hives.

To play you simply need to click the upgrades when you can afford them and survive as long as possible.
